Unleash Your Inner Innovator

Ready to embark on your STEM journey?
Join us at Stembotics and discover the endless possibilities that await!

VEX IQ Learning Plan

$ 100.00 /Month

Get hands-on with robotics! Learn the fundamentals of building, programming, and problem-solving with the VEX IQ platform. Perfect for beginners (ages 9+).

What's included?

  • Introduction to VEX IQ robotics system
  • Build and program basic robots
  • Develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills
  • Fun and engaging learning environment
Enroll NowLearn More

VEX IQ Competition Package

$ 160.00 per Season

Take your robotics skills to the next level! Prepare for VEX IQ competitions by learning advanced programming techniques, teamwork, and strategic thinking. VEX IQ Learning Plan Required. (ages 10+)

What's included?

  • Advanced VEX IQ programming and robotics concepts
  • Competition preparation and strategy development
  • Teamwork and communication skills
  • Experienced coaches and mentors
Enroll NowLearn More

FLL Learning Plan

$ 100.00 /Month

Learn using the FIRST® LEGO® League (FLL) Challenge! Our comprehensive program helps teams design, build, and program robots while tackling real-world scientific challenges. (ages 9-16)

What's included?

  • One LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Prime Set
  • Robot design, construction, and programming
  • Research and presentation development
Enroll NowLearn More

FLL Competition Package

$ 150.00 per Season

Compete in the FIRST® LEGO® League (FLL) Challenge! This allows your child to compete in real FLL challenges. FLL Learning Plan Required. (ages 9-16)

What's included?

  • Registration for Competitions
  • Team Registration
Enroll NowLearn More

Frequently Asked Questions

Have a question about our programs? We've got answers!

What are the age requirements for each program?

VEX IQ Learning is ideal for ages 9+, VEX IQ Competitive is recommended for ages 10+, and FLL Plan is designed for ages 9-16.

Do I need prior robotics experience?

No prior experience is necessary for VEX IQ Learning. VEX IQ Competitive and FLL Plan are geared towards students with a foundational understanding of robotics concepts.

What are the team sizes?

Our teans are capped at a small size (5 students for VEX, 7 students for FLL) to ensure personalized attention for each student.

What are the competition opportunities?

VEX IQ Competitive prepares students for local and regional VEX IQ competitions. FLL Plan specifically focuses on the FIRST® LEGO® League Challenge.

Join us in shaping a brighter future through STEM education. Contact us to learn more about our programs and how you can get involved.
